org.apache.shardingsphere.core.optimize.api.engine

接口 OptimizeEngine<R extends BaseRule,T extends SQLStatement>

  • 类型参数:
    R - type of rule
    T - type of SQL statement
    所有已知子接口:
    EncryptOptimizeEngine<T>, ShardingOptimizeEngine<T>
    所有已知实现类:
    EncryptInsertOptimizeEngine, EncryptWhereOptimizeEngine, ShardingDeleteOptimizeEngine, ShardingDropIndexOptimizeEngine, ShardingInsertOptimizeEngine, ShardingSelectOptimizeEngine, ShardingUpdateOptimizeEngine, TransparentOptimizeEngine

    public interface OptimizeEngine<R extends BaseRule,T extends SQLStatement>
    Optimize engine.
    作者:
    maxiaoguang, panjuan

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      OptimizedStatement optimize(R rule, ShardingTableMetaData shardingTableMetaData, String sql, List<Object> parameters, T sqlStatement)
      Optimize.

    • 方法详细资料

      • optimize

        OptimizedStatement optimize(R rule,
                            ShardingTableMetaData shardingTableMetaData,
                            String sql,
                            List<Object> parameters,
                            T sqlStatement)
        Optimize.
        参数:
        rule - rule
        shardingTableMetaData - table meta data
        sql - SQL
        parameters - SQL parameters
        sqlStatement - SQL statement
        返回:
        optimized statement
